sqlMap.update:
/* update Article*/ update article SET ID = #id# ,ID = #id#
,AUTHORID = #authorId# ,HOBBYID = #hobbyId#
,PRICEMIN = #priceMin# ,PRICEMAX = #priceMax# ,DESCRIPTION = #description#
,PRACTICEHOUR = #practiceHour# ,TITLE = #title#
,ARTICLEABSTRACT = #articleAbstract#
,date = now() WHERE ID = #id#
sqlMap.select:
/*count Article*/ SELECT count(*) FROM article a WHERE 1=1
and a.ID = #id#
and a.AUTHORID = #authorId# and a.HOBBYID = #hobbyId# and a.DATE = #date# and a.PRICEMIN = #priceMin# and a.PRICEMAX = #priceMax# and a.DESCRIPTION = #description#
